reviews.review: 10 cъебывающих Гордонов из сити 17 из 10
Rejugando esto año tras año mientras espero el 3... (10 años han pasado) y la verdad que no pierde re-jugabilidad. Un juegazo.

Simply one word for this game, "Awesome". I played half life 2, Half life Black Mesa & now i played this episode one, I love the AI interaction they feel so alive they respond to our every action let me be clear its response rather than reaction.
The puzzle element in this game is top class no clues are given & the beast or big boss fights are one of the best i ever played.
I am using core2duo (old pc) with 1 gb graphic card & 4gb ddr2 ram yet this game run smoothly on it in medium settings yet i felt as if it is HD without causing any lag full credit to valve for this.
I highly recommend this game for every true gamer/
Una excelente primera parte, que mejoró el Motor Source con mas detalles, un poco corto, pero bueno, recomiendo fuertemente conseguir la Saga Completa.
这一章相对较短，但不得不说，这里面见证了戈登和艾利克斯的情感成长

O jogo é bom, mas os cenários são não muito originais, eu sei que o jogo se passa na Cidade 17 destruida mas, comparando com o Episódio 2, os cenários são feios.

Sem falar que o jogo é bem curto, serio eu consegui zerar o jogo em 3 ou 4 horas, jogando sem para no caso. E o começo é bem chato, demorei um tempo para entender o que era para fazer.

Tirando isso o jogo é bom e recomendo bastante.
О ебат, продолжение...

Interesante... solo recomendable si terminaste el Half Life 2.
Es muy corto, pero más largo se podría volver aburrido.
i spent %60 of my time on %10 of the game the game is only 3 hours long and the end section is just padding
Achei sem Açucar,mas é legalzinho.

Toujours dans la continuité, l'épisode 1 est la suite directe d'Half-Life 2. 

Le gameplay est moins bien rythmé que dans l'épisode 2, mais reste tout de même intéressant. Le jeu possède quelques améliorations du moteur Source, mais rien de bien méchant. Sa durée de vie est moyenne puisqu'elle ne dépassera pas les 5h de jeu.

Même d'un point de vue scénaristique, ça n'avance pas des masses, c'est la fuite et puis c'est tout. L'épisode travaille surtout sur la relation entre Alyx et Gordon.

Souvent vu comme le bémol de la série après Blue Shift, Half-Life 2: Episode One est bon, mais pas exceptionnel.

Cette épisode est un épisode transitoire, qui va mettre en place tous les évènements et va faire de l'épisode 2 un excellent jeu.

Mi analisis sincero...

[i]Half-life 2: Episode One, es la continuación del juego Half-life 2... (Dejare de contarte cosas que ya sabes..)... Pero antes me sentia muy confundido al no saber nada y tener 3 Half-life 2 xD.![/i]

En realidad este juego es mucho, pero mucho mas corto que el anterior (Half-life 2), no se porque esta dividido en dos partes, asi que ni me preguntes xD (enrealidad son 3)... jaja
[b]Pero te lo recomiendo al 100%, enserio que sera una de tus mejores inversiones... Si eres fan (o aunque no lo seas) creeme que no quedaras con ningun desagrado de este juego...[/b]

Posee una serie de logros que no son para nada conplicados, que te aseguro que si los lees de que se tratan antes de empezar el juego, podras completarlos con una sola vez que lo jueges...

Excelente historia, buenos graficos, excelente modo de juego... que más te podria decir... te lo recomiendo amigo ser humano :D.!
I like it but it aint a very good episode after playing both episodes i recommend episode 2 story line but u have to play episode 1 anyway

Here's how the game plays out: 

1)Babysit tan navi, get thrown by robot, 

2)babysit tan navi, 

3)take a break from babysitting to contain the explosion from the last game, 

4)babysit tan navi again, 

5)babysit tan navi in pitch dark hallways with randomly spawning zombies that spontaniously combust on occasion, 

6)babysit tan navi in pitch dark hallways with randomly spawning zombies that combust themselves on purpose,

7)finally get into the open...where you continue to babysit (at least now you can see),

8)tan navi goes away so you have to deal with the overpowered striders from the last game on your own,

9)cliffhanger.  

HEY!! LISTEN!!!/10  only buy if it's on sale, or as part of the Valve complete pack (preferably both)
Suite de HL2 je conseil de l'acheter si vous avez joué à HL2 tout comme HL2 ep 2 pour finir l'histoire en attendant HL3.

The story continues! Valve had a good idea making it episodic, so that they can spew parts fatser, but it only worked up to a point. And we're still waiting for HL3 :(

Pros:
- furthering the already interesting story of the Half-Life universe
- great gameplay
- 2 new enemies introduced!
- another spooky chapter in a non-horror game just like Ravenholm in the previous game.

Cons:
- no new weapons
- npc allies are still useless, except for Alyx

Everything from my review of Half-Life 2 applies to the episodes as well.

Disliked the first HL, loved HL2, but for some reason I dislike HL2:E1. Probably it's the continues long dark hallways & tiny rooms filled with aliens. Don't be mislead but the pictures in the sotre above that shows open world. You will spend 90% of this game running around finding electricity in tiny abandoned bulidings.

ATTENZIONE SPOILER DI HALF-LIFE 2 (FREE SPOILER HAL-LIFE 2: EPISODE 1)
Fra i giochi considerati capolavori intoccabili c' è di sicuro HL2, va però detto che il finale poteva lasciare un po' con l' amaro in bocca non per il finale in sè ma per le molte domande lasciate in sospeso. Ed è questo l' obbiettivo che si pone questa espansione.

TRAMA:
 Il nucleo della cittadella sta per esplodere, quindi il nostro Gordon Freeman deve provare ad evitarlo e fuggire da city 17. Facile a parole.

GAMEPLAY: 
Il gameplay è essenzialmente uguale a quello di HL2, momenti di fps puro unito enigmi basati sulla fisica ad un ritmo incalzante. Apprezzabili alcuni enigmi in azione che tengono il ritmo serrato.

AMBIENTAZIONE:
E' sempre city 17, restano alcune tinte horror resta il senso distopico.

DIFETTI: 
-Indubbiamente è corto. 
-Puttanasitting

CONCLUSIONE:
In realtà c' è poco da dire, se vi è piaciuto half life 2 questo vi piacerà
Все шикарно. По эпиздам можно не делить, сценарий соблюдается. Можно было бы сделать все эпизоды в одном.

Evet Half-Life 2'yi bitirdikten sonra mooralim bozulmuştu çünkü episode one ve two'yu devam oyunu değil normal oyunun interaktif dlim tarzında zannediyordum .10 dakika sonra internnette gezerken Half-Life 2'nin devamı olduğunumgördüm direk episode one ve two'yu satın aldım aldığım saatin sabaha doğru 4 olduğu için inmesini bekledim 2 oyunda 5'e doğru indi ve indikten sonra uyudum öğlen kalktım ve bilgisayarı açtım oyunun devamı gelecekti vay beh diye hissediyordum oyua başladım oynadım ve oynadım biraz abartarak oynadığım için(fanboyluk) oyun 1-2 güne bitti zaten kısaydı 9 yada 7 bölümdü sanırım oyun bence hiç dolu dolu geçmedi kanser(Haalf-Life klasiği) ve boştu sanki oyun ve seri uzasın diye yapılmış gibidi spoiler vermek istemiyoru ve ben şahsen eğlenmedim ama GELELİM EPİSODE TWO'YA...

The game continues the story from the point where Half Life 2 ended. 
I would only recommend this game to Half Life fans. It doesn't really stand on it's own. 

pros:
- good level design
- atmosphere
- a couple of cool fights/action

cons:
- a bit tedious in the beginning (but livens up quickly)
- essentially the same game as HL2 (not much new)
- short (4 hours is taking it slow)
Maybe one of the best game I've ever played :)

норм

A worthy continuation of the main series. It was a welcome change to be joined by a useful and competent companion. Quite a stark contrast to the bleak and lonely nature of the previous Half-Life installments. The game introduces several unique mechanics slowly and intuitively. The episode is pleasantly brief and digestible within a good 3-4 hours. 

Definitely worth playing directly after finishing the main story in Half-Life 2.
Отличный аддон по сути
Played it in 61 Minutes. Its an effrontery for that money. 2/10

I liked Half-Life 2 but I couldnt stand this one. It was nothing but fetch-quests, escorting missions, and you had a follower with an annnoying AI that followed too close and jumped straight into battle getting herself killed too easy. To make matters worse, 90% of the maps were tight corridors, so if you were getting shot at and needed to back up to take cover, chances are your partner would be behind you and you'd have to wait for her to move while you're getting shot. 

I personally wouldn't recommend it. If you want to play it for the story, the only story is at he begining in the tower. After the tower, it's just irritating battles, unavoidable traps, and getting shot at without cover.
Fuck Alyx
still 10/10

不得不说剧情和游戏性略逊于初代. 而且就算跟半条命二相比这个序章更有圈钱的嫌疑. 剧情马马虎虎就算是补玩也没有太多的亮点. 
就好像一口没吃掉的蛋糕. 放在冰箱里过几天在吃完的道理是一样的. 因为自己知道冰箱里放的是什么 . 也就没什么心情啦. 剧情有点拖沓. 场景比较绕. 整体降低连贯性. 而且这款起源引擎的升级版本在画面上毫无进步. 但是性能却下降了. 游戏某些地方会轻微掉帧.但是只是瞬间. 奔着名气和这份经典来的. 本人很尊重半条命. 只是发表下个人观点. 游戏是一款好游戏这毋庸置疑. 尤其是中文语音更要点赞.....
Ничего не могу с собой поделать, но меня все не покидает чувство, что это должен был быть не эпизод, а логический конец второй части.

The game starts with a retcon to the ending to Half Life 2, but in this incarnation, the story continues as Gordon, Alyx, and Dog struggle to escape City 11, all the while fighting of teeming hordes of headcrab zombies, taking on the forces of the Combine, and saving Dr. Vance. This as well as Episode 2 are both solid games that are definietely worth the play. I recommend any half life fan to give these two games a try.
